testimonials.quote: Excellent food and service. The ambiance is also great, making it a perfect spot for a special occasion or a business meeting.
testimonials.author: Jaco V.

testimonials.quote: Consistently high quality food and impeccable service. Pachas remains one of the top fine dining experiences in Pretoria.
testimonials.author: Samantha K.

testimonials.quote: From the moment we arrived, the staff were attentive and friendly. The menu has a great selection, and every dish we ordered was beautifully presented and tasted fantastic.
testimonials.author: Pieter & Susan

testimonials.quote: The Biltong soup the Best! Pachas is a great Restaurant with excellent service from Andre the waiter and the Chef Corne . The food is excellent from the starter till the end.
testimonials.author: 74marilisev

testimonials.quote: Excellent menu and great food. The quality still is exceptional. Atmosphere is great and attention to detail is tops. Very special!
testimonials.author: 05 Mar 2021

testimonials.quote: We celebrated my husband's 70th birthday at Pachas What an occasion!! We could not have chosen a better place anywhere. The food, attention to detail, the professionalism and service gets full marks.
testimonials.author: 950weldah
